children.name: about.txt
children.content: I am Ketan S Hegde, a passionate software developer specializing in full-stack web and mobile application development. I thrive on building scalable, user-centered solutions using modern technologies. I have experience in web, mobile, and AI-based systems and enjoy solving challenging problems with creative approaches.

children.name: vitals7.txt
children.content:
Software Development Intern | Vitals7, Inc. | May 2025 – Present
- Developed UI for healthcare web/mobile applications using ReactJS & React Native.
- Implemented responsive components aligned with healthcare UX standards.
- Built REST APIs using FastAPI and integrated into the frontend.

children.name: phntech.txt
children.content:
Web Development Intern | PHN Technology Pvt. Ltd. | Apr 2023 – Jun 2023
- Built static websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Added interactivity and ensured responsiveness with Bootstrap.

children.name: taskgpt.txt
children.content:
taskGPT - AI CLI Agent | Python, Gemini API, Docker, VS Code Extension | Apr 2025
- Built cross-platform CLI tool for AI agents with auto-setup and persistent config.
- Released on PyPI & GitHub with Dockerized one-line deployment.
- Created VS Code extension for in-editor usage.

children.name: assessment_system.txt
children.content:
Intelligent Assessment & Evaluation System | MERN Stack | Dec 2024
- Full-stack assessment platform with group creation, student management, and file uploads.
- Integrated Gemini API for question generation and grading.

children.name: music_recommender.txt
children.content:
Emotion-Based Music Recommendation System | Flask, BERT | Aug 2024
- AI-driven music recommender analyzing text emotions using BERT.
- Implemented content-based filtering for personalized suggestions.

children.name: library_system.txt
children.content: Library Management System | Django, MySQL | Jun 2024 - Managed book issuing, returns, and inventory. - Added librarian controls and automated email notifications. link : https://github.com/KetanHegde/chatbot

children.name: skills.txt
children.content:
Languages: C, C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, SQL
Frontend: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, ReactJS, NextJS, AngularJS
Mobile: React Native, Expo, EAS
Frameworks/Libraries: Django, Flask, ExpressJS, FastAPI
Backend/Databases: Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, NeoDB
Tools & IDEs: VS Code, Eclipse, Jupyter Notebook, MySQL Workbench, Postman, Selenium
Platforms: Linux, Git, GitHub, Docker, Firebase, Google OAuth
Package Managers: npm, pip, Maven, Gradle, Bun
